channel.title: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces
channel.description:
Hi, I have a problem that may or may not be easy to fix. I do not know what is causing it.
This does not happen very often but it happens once in a while. This only happens to my account and not to any of my player's accounts.
The problem is that when I log in, I cannot use any objects, click any buttons, or use any teleport commands.
Thanks

item.title: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @johnny1223 johnny1223
item.description:
@johnny1223 wrote:

It didn’t work

I don’t think it’s related to controlers.

Read full topic
item.source: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces

item.title: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Lucas7 Lucas7
item.description:
@Lucas7 wrote:

You might have some controlers that are not closing. Just import ControlerHandler into Player.java and under Public Void run() just add something like this…

this will close all running controlers and most likely release your player if it has anything to do with it.

Read full topic
item.source: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces

item.title: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Pixore Pixore
item.description:
@Pixore wrote:

Does your server have any minigames? Because the effect of the minigame may not be closed after you exit if you didn’t put it in the code.

Read full topic
item.source: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces

item.title: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @johnny1223 johnny1223
item.description:
@johnny1223 wrote:

Yeah I would suspect that but this isn’t a delta source, and there is no blocking.

But thanks for the reply

Read full topic
item.source: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces

item.title: Player Glitch - Cannot Use any Objects/Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

yer probably blocked
in delta’s it’s an integer called action that’s set to 1 which blocks you from doing stuff

Read full topic
